resources.string: Below are information about symptoms, signs, and solutions for common emergency cases.
Your location has been sent. Please enter information regarding age and gender of the victim, Then choose notable symptoms, signs of victim by clicking the list below. Finally, press Confirm button.
EmerCall (Emergency Call) is an application made for the purpose of supporting emergency cases with only a button press.

In addition, EmerCall is also integrated a database of notable symptoms, signs, and proper first-aid methods for emergency cases. This application also allows users to track the incoming ambulances when an emergency case occurs.
EmerCall: send an emergency signal. When activated, it will send user location, victim status to hospital server, meanwhile allowing users to access EmerDict.
EmerDict: a database of emergency cases. EmerDict contains information about signs, symptoms, first-aid methods, references of emergency cases.
EmerAccount: contains user information for monitoring purposes from hospitals.
You can interact these functions by the navigation bar at the bottom of the screen.
These information contain name, date of birth, gender, health insurance ID, address and personal ID. These information are unchangeable, please enter correctly.
When activated, EmerCall will send user location to the server, helping designated ambulance to approach the user faster, increasing victim survivability.
Thus, to ensure EmerCall performance, please authorize Location Permission for this application.
To authorize, press AUTHORIZE LOCATION PERMISSION button below. A message will appear, asking the user for confirmation. Press Allow to confirm.
After successfully authorizing Location Permission, press Next to continue.
Do not press Android Back button when using EmerCall, since this may affect user experience.
In EmerCall, to avoid emergency signals of other users, DO NOT perform fake calls. These actions below are considered to be a fake call:
- Comfirms emergency request and the ambulance cannot find any users or victims after reaching the destination.
- Confirms emergency request and then transfers the victim to the hospital (in case ambulances are unavailable, the user will receiver a notification from the server)
If a device using EmerCall has performed 3 fake calls, it will be banned from EmerCall system.
After activating emergency signal, observe the victim, select corresponding signs and symptoms, and track the upcoming ambulance (if available)
Your device has been banned from EmerCall system.
The system has detected that you had performed 3 fake calls. We apologize for this inconvenience, but we have to ensure the experience of other users.
How can I regain my accessibility to EmerCall system?
To regain EmerCall accessibility, please contact the nearest hospital or medical facility connected to EmerCall system, or application provider via these contact information:
